bill.title: Charter schools; create process for establishing conversion and open enrollment.
bill.description: An Act To Create A New Process For Establishing Charter Schools; To Reenact Sections 37-28-1 Through 37-28-19, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Created A Process For The Establishment And Operation Of Charter Schools, And Which Were Repealed By Operation Of Law On July 1, 2009; To Amend Reenacted Section 37-28-1, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise The Legislative Intent Regarding The Creation Of Charter Schools; To Amend Reenacted Section 37-28-3, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Define Additional Words And Phrases Used In The Charter School Law; To Codify New Section 37-28-4, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize Charter Schools To Be Created By Converting An Existing Public School To Charter Status Or By Establishing A New Open Enrollment Charter School; To Amend Reenacted Section 37-28-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Clarify The Requirements For A Petition Seeking To Convert An Existing Public School To Charter School Status; To Codify New Section 37-28-6, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Prescribe The Requirements For A Petition Requesting A Charter For An Open Enrollment Charter School; To Amend Reenacted Section 37-28-7, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Require The State Board Of Education To Prescribe Rules And Regulations For The Creation Of Open Enrollment Charter Schools; To Amend Reenacted Section 37-28-9, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Clarify That Certain Requirements Relating To The Terms Of A Charter Apply Only To Charters For Local Schools Converting To Charter Status; To Codify New Section 37-28-10, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Prescribe Certain Requirements For The Terms Of A Charter For An Open Enrollment Charter School; To Codify New Section 37-28-10.1, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Prescribe The Powers And Duties Of Open Enrollment Charter Schools; To Amend Reenacted Section 37-28-11, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity To The Provisions Of This Act; To Amend Reenacted Section 37-28-13, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Establish The Duration Of Charters For Open Enrollment Charter Schools; To Codify New Section 37-28-14, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Require The State Department Of Education To Annually Evaluate Each Open Enrollment Charter School And To Authorize The Board To Place A School On Probation Or Revoke Its Charter For Certain Reasons; To Amend Reenacted Section 37-28-15, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide For The State Funding Of Open Enrollment Charter Schools, To Prohibit The Use Of State Funds To Secure The School's Debts, And To Require Annual Audits To Be Performed On Such Schools; To Amend Reenacted Section 37-28-17, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That Employees Of Open Enrollment Charter Schools Are State Employees; To Amend Reenacted Section 37-28-19, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity To The Provisions Of This Act; To Authorize The Continued Operation Of Charter Schools Established Under The Original Charter School Statutes; To Repeal Sections 37-165.1 Through 37-165-27, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Are The Conversion Charter School Act Of 2010; And For Related Purposes.
